page.title: 19Area Transport
page.content: The area has many means of transport. You can travel to many places by bus from nearby Wolverhampton and Bilston itself. The area is served by West Midlands Passenger Transport. There are complaints about buses being dirty. Railway transport from Wolverhampton is best and trains run mostly on time. The station is a new one and improvements are still being made with a new car park nearby. The Canals run through the area though they are little used today. Some people pass through on pleasure boats. The areas roads, particularly off the Main roads, often need repair. For car drivers the M5 is quite close and a link road is being built from the Birmingham New Road. Some people wait for this road to help them miss a lot of urban traffic while others think that the Birmingham New Road is already too busy and the Link will worsen it.
